__e: Trust me, I know these things!
I'm learning this one - true - but I know this is the right move!
I think you can trust me to know how to handle a woman.
—What I have to say is very important too. Trust me.
Don't file it now, trust me.
I know it's tough on both of you to come back here, but trust me.
-Continue on. Report to me in two Earth days.
Go out to make a personal inspection of that park and report to me.
Give me a full report as soon as possible, please.
I know you can't holler per se, so maybe just you give a wave or something.
Please, just give me a sign if you don't want me to do it.
As you wish and make me some strong black coffee, please
Do me a favour. Introduce yourself to one of them.
You're an adviser here, Doctor, a guest, and you can oblige me by confining your authority to your own duties.
Make my day and take a drink at my table.
Do me a favour, will you?
Well I shall, if you do me a favor.
As your friend I want to ask you for a favour.
If you don't think the price if fair, make me an offer, you never know, I just might take it....
I'm trying to find work as an assassin.
John, get me out of here or I'll spill everything!
You'll have to get me out of this house!
Get me out of here, you guys!
That's only because I want to help you, Then get me out of here,
If you can only get me away from here for a few hours, that's all I ask.
This website and all its items are for ages 18 years old - Get me out of here!
This website and all its items are for ages 18 years old - Get me out of here!
Now, you show me the door out of here or your feet are the only things you're gonna see for the rest of your crummy life.
If you can only get me away from here for a few hours, that's all I ask.
Let me know if you have any luck with that.
Let me know if you have any questions about this new policy.
Let me know if you need more information. I will be happy to help.
Let me know when this item is back in stock!
YES, NOTIFY ME WHEN IT'S READY
Let me know if you have any questions about this new policy.
Let me know if you need more information. I will be happy to help.
And my dear man, if there's anything I can do to help, by all means let me know.
